info.summary: AI pair programming in your terminal
info.description: AI pair programming in your terminal with git integration

pricing_details.Open Source: Free - ~$0.007 per file processed, users pay LLM API costs only, Git integration, multiple LLM support

info.summary: AWS's comprehensive AI development assistant, evolved from CodeWhisperer to provide deep integration...
info.description: AWS's comprehensive AI development assistant, evolved from CodeWhisperer to provide deep integration with the entire AWS ecosystem. Features agent architecture for autonomous cloud development tasks, from code generation to infrastructure deployment. Particularly valuable for teams building on AWS, offering specialized knowledge of AWS services and best practices.

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - 50 chat interactions monthly, 10 agent invocations monthly
pricing_details.Pro: $19/month - Unlimited chat and agent invocations, 4,000 lines of code transformation monthly, additional transformation at $0.003/line

info.description: Enterprise-grade AI coding assistant with 200K token context and deep codebase understanding

pricing_details.Enterprise: Custom pricing - AI Coding Assistant for Enterprises with 200K token context and deep codebase understanding

swe_bench.achievement: #1 open-source agent on SWE-bench Verified at time of announcement

info.summary: Prompt, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web applications
info.description: AI-powered full-stack web application builder with in-browser development environment

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - Limited tokens, basic app building
pricing_details.Pro: $20/month - Higher token limits, advanced features, priority support, additional token reloads at $30
pricing_details.pricing_note: Reached $20M ARR in 2 months - fastest startup growth ever

info.description: Collaborative workspace interface for ChatGPT that allows side-by-side editing of code and text with inline AI suggestions

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - Limited access (gradual rollout), basic Canvas features
pricing_details.Plus: $20/month - Full Canvas access, GPT-4o access, collaborative workspace
pricing_details.Pro: $200/month - Unlimited o1 access, O1 Pro mode, GPT-4.1 access, advanced Canvas features

info.description: Interactive component generation feature within Claude that creates and iterates on code, diagrams, and applications in a side panel
Terminal-based coding agent with deep codebase understanding and multi-file editing

pricing_details.Pro: $20/month - 10-40 prompts per 5 hours, terminal-based coding agent, Claude web access included, secure Google Cloud VMs
pricing_details.20x Pro: $200/month - 20x higher limits, maximum priority, enterprise features

swe_bench.achievement: First release of Claude Code as limited research preview

info.summary: Meet Cline, an AI assistant that can use your CLI and editor
info.description: Autonomous coding agent VS Code extension with multi-modal capabilities

pricing_details.Open Source: Free - Costs vary: minimal to $50+ daily, depends on usage intensity and model choice, VS Code extension, multiple provider support

info.summary: Advanced AI code review platform that uses Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) analysis for deeper code under...
info.description: Advanced AI code review platform that uses Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) analysis for deeper code understanding beyond surface-level pattern matching. With 10M+ pull requests processed, CodeRabbit demonstrates the scalability and effectiveness of AI-powered code review, helping teams maintain code quality and accelerate development cycles.

pricing_details.Lite: $12/month per PR creator - Seat-based pricing (PR creators only), Basic code review
pricing_details.Pro: $20/month per PR creator - Advanced features, Bitbucket and Azure DevOps support, Processes millions of PRs monthly

info.summary: The open-source autopilot for your IDE
info.description: Open source autopilot for your IDE with customizable LLM backends

pricing_details.Open Source: Free - Users pay only LLM API costs, version 1.0 released February 2025, $3M seed funding, Continue Hub for sharing custom assistants

info.description: AI-powered code editor with $500M ARR and 360K+ paying developers

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - Limited completions and chat messages
pricing_details.Pro: $20/month - Unlimited completions and chat, Claude 4 access, GPT-4 access, privacy mode
pricing_details.Ultra: $200/month - Everything in Pro, Max Mode with token-based billing, model provider API costs + 20% margin, Claude 4 requests ~$0.30 each

info.description: Autonomous AI software engineer capable of planning, coding, debugging, and deploying applications

pricing_details.Core Plan: $20/month - 9 ACUs included, additional ACUs at $2.25 each
pricing_details.pricing_note: 96% price reduction from original $500/month in April 2025

swe_bench.updates: Launched Devin 2.0 and 2.1 in 2025 with price reduction ($20/month) but no new benchmark scores published

info.summary: Autonomous unit test generation for Java
info.description: AI-powered unit test generation tool that autonomously writes entire suites of JUnit tests for Java code using reinforcement learning

pricing_details.Enterprise: $2,100/developer/year ($175/month) - Java/Kotlin focus, Reinforcement learning (not LLMs), 250x faster than manual test writing, Custom pricing for scale

info.description: AI pair programmer providing code suggestions, chat, and autonomous agents

pricing_details.Pro: $10/month - 300 premium requests, code completions and chat, additional requests at $0.04 each
pricing_details.Pro+: $39/month - 1,500 premium requests, everything in Pro, priority access, advanced features
pricing_details.pricing_note: Premium requests vary by model complexity

swe_bench.source: GitHub Blog - In celebration of MSFT's 50th anniversary
swe_bench.context: Part of GitHub Copilot's new agentic capabilities in VS Code

info.summary: Google's strategic response to GitHub Copilot, featuring an industry-leading 2M token context window...
info.description: Google's strategic response to GitHub Copilot, featuring an industry-leading 2M token context window and aggressive free tier offering 180K monthly completions. Represents Google's bid to capture developer mindshare through superior technical specifications and generous free usage. Demonstrates Google's commitment to competing in the developer tools space with its advanced Gemini models.

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - 180,000 code completions monthly (most generous), basic AI assistance, Google Cloud integration
pricing_details.Standard: $19/month (monthly) / $45/month (annual) - Unlimited completions, advanced features, priority support
pricing_details.Enterprise: $75/month per user - Everything in Standard, private repository customization, enterprise support, advanced security

info.description: Asynchronous AI coding agent that works in background cloud VMs for GitHub workflows

pricing_details.Public Beta: Free - 5 free tasks per calendar day, Gemini 2.5 Pro powered, secure Google Cloud VMs, code execution capabilities
pricing_details.pricing_note: Future pricing expected as platform matures

swe_bench.update: Entered public beta in May 2025 but no new scores published

info.description: AI assistant integrated into JetBrains IDEs providing code completions, chat assistance, and multi-file editing with Junie agent

pricing_details.AI Free: $0/month - Unlimited local model support, limited cloud features, basic AI assistance
pricing_details.AI Pro: $10/month - Enhanced cloud features, better quotas, priority support
pricing_details.AI Ultimate: $20/month - Highest quota levels, priority access to latest models, premium features, advanced support

info.summary: The last piece of software you'll ever need
info.description: AI full-stack engineer that builds entire web applications from natural language descriptions

pricing_details.Free: $0/month - Limited credits, basic features, community support
pricing_details.Pro: $25/month - 100 credits monthly, advanced features, priority support, credit-based system
pricing_details.pricing_note: Reached $13.5M ARR in 3 months, $50M total funding

info.description: AI-assisted development feature included in Visual Studio and VS Code that provides smarter IntelliSense by using ML to rank code suggestions by context and API usage patterns

pricing_details.Developer: Free - Generous free tier, basic testing capabilities
pricing_details.Teams: $19/month per user - Seat-based pricing (active contributors only), advanced testing features, team collaboration
